entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
